alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Hamilton; Merrick; Polk; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 4:29AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of York, Hamilton, northern Fillmore, west central Merrick and southern Polk Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 429 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Osceola to near Chapman. Movement was south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Stromsburg around 435 AM CDT. Benedict around 445 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Aurora, Gresham, Hampton, Waco and Stockham. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 330 and 365. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings.
